Header.title: SBI Insurance Portal
Header.paragraph: Enhancing Customer Experience and Retention through AI-Driven Personalization.

About.paragraph: SBI Insurance leverages AI to provide tailored policy recommendations, predictive analytics for risk assessment, and gamified engagement to enhance customer loyalty.

Services.name: AI-Driven Personalization
Services.text: Tailored policy recommendations based on real-time data analysis.

Services.name: Predictive Analytics
Services.text: Identify potential policy lapsation risks and recommend proactive measures.

Services.name: Gamified Engagement
Services.text: Reward-based strategies to improve customer interaction and loyalty.

Services.name: Ethical AI & Compliance
Services.text: Transparent AI solutions ensuring GDPR and RBI compliance.
